Activity: Log in, check emails, and respond to urgent requests. Put on my favorite playlist to get in the zone.
Review feedback from @ehrv-1 (EHR Vendor Liaison) regarding customization options. Document any limitations or constraints that may impact the planned EHR system updates.
Refine the design document based on the vendor feedback. Adjust plans for data field creation, workflow customization, and validation rules as needed.
Schedule a meeting with @da-1 and @da-2 (Data Analysts) to discuss data reporting requirements for influenza trends. Topic: 'Data Reporting Requirements for Influenza Trends'.
Meet with @da-1 and @da-2 to discuss the necessary data points and report formats for analyzing influenza trends. Gather insights on their specific needs and expectations.
Lunch Break - Try out the new salad bar in the cafeteria.
Incorporate the data reporting requirements into the design document. Ensure that the planned EHR system updates will support the generation of necessary reports.
Develop a detailed plan for creating new data fields. Define the data type, length, and validation rules for each field. Ensure compatibility with existing EHR data.
Outline the steps involved in customizing existing workflows. Identify specific points in the workflow where data collection prompts and validation rules should be implemented.

Review the design document with @itpm-1 (IT Project Manager) to get the project approved and to ensure the plan aligns with the overall project timeline and budget. Topic: 'Review of EHR Update Design Document'.
Review tasks and plan for tomorrow. Check email and respond to urgent requests.
